overview:
As CEO I successfully guided WeBoost’s transition, in less than 3 years, from a start-up company to a growing company, now generating a 7-digit yearly turnover.

Always setting new objectives, I am now leading the company towards a consolidation of its assets: developing its international network; improving its search services and multi-purpose comparison tools; delivering more comprehensive and compelling information.

WeBoost is an independent Media Company, owner of an international network of rapidly growing websites. WeBoost’s network includes over 100 properties, distinctly designed to support consumers along their online shopping and buying path.

In the past I have also worked as Advertising Manager for One Worldwide, planning and managing important advertising budgets and campaigns throughout a broad spectrum of countries (Italy, UK, US, Brazil).

Also gained relevant experience as an Account and Online Marketing Manager on other previous positions covered in GoAdv and Roncaglia & Wijkander.
